description: Creative automation engine that generates dynamic images, PDFs, and videos from templates and data.

actions.name: convert_file_to_url
actions.description: Convert uploaded file(s) into media URL(s) consumable by Placid templates.

actions.name: create_image
actions.description: Generates a dynamic image from a specified template using input data.

actions.name: create_pdf
actions.description: Generates a PDF document from a specified template.

actions.name: create_video
actions.description: Produces a video based on a template.

actions.name: get_image
actions.description: Retrieves a generated image by its ID.

actions.name: get_pdf
actions.description: Retrieves the generated PDF by its ID.

actions.name: get_video
actions.description: Retrieves the generated video by its ID.
